_header: Go little ring to that ilk sweet
_description: On a present of a ring — one stanza rhyme royal

BLRoy17Dvi.First Lines: Goo lytell ryng to that ilke suetethat hath my hert in [    ] deniseyne…
BLRoy17Dvi.Last Lines: …then I woll you sey boldlymy master wold that he wer þe
BLRoy17Dvi.Note: Added to front flyleaf by a hand of s. 16.
